title: In My Dream, Only You Come Out
alternative_title: In My Erotic Dream, Only You Always Appear;In My Wet Dreams, Only You Always Appear ;내 몽정엔 맨날 아저씨만 나와요
status: In My Erotic Dream, Only You Always Appear;In My Wet Dreams, Only You Always Appear ;내 몽정엔 맨날 아저씨만 나와요
description:
Description :
        “In my wet dreams, only you always appear.”

Tae Hwan ignores Yeong Hae bombshell confession, whom he had looked upon like his own nephew since he was young, thinking it was a joke.

One day, when Yeong Hae, who was upset by Tae Hwan's reaction, continued to act harshly, "I want you to pick me with something bigger and thicker."

After visiting a urologist, Tae Hwan discovers a new taste, and their relationship takes a new turn...?!
